MEDIA_INCORRECT: âš ï¸ Media was not parsed properly. Try again.
PARSING_ERROR: âš ï¸ Message was not parsed properly. Try again.
PARSING_ERROR_TEXT: âš ï¸ Message was not parsed properly. Please be sure to send a text message without media or any addition.
BUTTONS_ROWS_LIMIT: âš ï¸ You reached the limit of 14 rows. Try again.
BUTTONS_CULUMNS_LIMIT: âš ï¸ You reached the limit of 8 culumns. Try again.
BUTTONS_TOTAL_LIMIT: âš ï¸ You reached the limit of 92 buttons. Try again.
BUTTONS_MISSING_LINK: âš ï¸ You didn't set a link to one or more buttons. Try again.
BUTTONS_NAME_LIMIT: âš ï¸ You reached the name limit (64 characters) for one or more buttons. Try again.
BUTTONS_NAME_TOO_SHORT: âš ï¸ You created one or more buttons without name. Try again.

WELCOME_SETTING: ğŸ’¬ Welcome Message From here you can set a welcome message sent when someone join the group.
W_SEND_EVERYTIME: Send the welcome message at every join of users in the group
W_SEND_ONCE: Send the welcome message only at the first join of the user in the group
ANTIFLOOD_DESCRIPTION:
From here you can set a punishment for those who send many messages in a short time.

Currently the antiflood is activated when {messages} messages are sent within {seconds} seconds.
ANTIFLOOD_PUNISHMENT: AntiFlood, user sent more than {number} messages in {time} seconds
ASK_WRITE: ğŸ“ Send now a number to set it
SEND_PUNISHMENT_DURATION: Send now the duration of the chosen punishment ({punishment})
STIME_DESCRIPTION: Minimum: {minimum} Maximum: {maximum} Format examples: 2 month 5 days 12 hour 6 minutes 30 second, 5d 1h Current duration: {time}
SNUM_TOOBIG: âš ï¸ Your number is bigger than {number}. Try again.
SNUM_TOOSMALL: âš ï¸ Your number is smaller than {number}. Try again.
SNUM_CB_TOOBIG: âš ï¸ This is bigger than limit ({number}).
SNUM_CB_TOOSMALL: âš ï¸ This is smaller than minimum limit ({number}).
STIME_INVALID_INPUT: âš ï¸ Your time is invalid. Try again.
PROMOTED_DESCRIPTION: Use buttons below to change admin permissions
TITLE_CHANGED_TO: admin title has been changed to
SEND_NEW_TITLE: Send now the new title to assign
ALREADY_IN_ROLE: âš ï¸ User already has this role.
NOT_IN_ROLE: âš ï¸ User doesn't have this role.
TOO_LOW_LEVEL_SET_ROLE: âš ï¸ You haven't permission to set this role, it's higher level than your
TOO_LOW_LEVEL_SET_USER: âš ï¸ You can't change permissions to this user because he is higher level than you
INVALID_TARGET: âš ï¸ Invalid target, please reply to an user message or enter a username, if known will be used
INVALID_TITLE:
âš ï¸ Invalid title, reply to an user with "/title customName" or identifier "/title @username customName"

Maximum 16 characters, emoji not allowed
Use /untitle to remove a title to an user
USELESS_ROLE: âš ï¸ You can't set this role because user already has all it's permissions
MISSING_ROLE_PERM: âš ï¸ You haven't permission to set roles
UNKNOWN_ERROR: âš ï¸ An unknown error occurred, contact the bot owner to fix
USER_IS_ADMIN: âš ï¸ User is administrator of the group, use /reload if you think otherwise
USER_NOT_MEMBER: âš ï¸ User is not a member of the group
USER_NEVER_BEEN_MEMBER: âš ï¸ User has never been in the group
USER_NOT_ADMIN: âš ï¸ User is not an administrator of the group
ADMIN_TITLE_EMOJI_FOUND: âš ï¸ Admin title cannot have emoji
USER_NO_MORE_ADMIN: âš ï¸ User is no more administrator
PERM_ACTIVE_BY_DEFAULT: âš ï¸ You can't disable this permission beacause it's enabled by default for every group user
MISSING_ADMIN_PERMISSION: âš ï¸ You don't have this permission so you can't give it to other users, if you think otherwise use /reload
CANT_CHANGE_YOUR_PERMS: âš ï¸ You can't change permissions on yourself
MISSING_RIGHTS: âš ï¸ I haven't enough rights to perform this action, if you are trying to promote an user i can't do that if another admin did it first
CANT_DELETE: âš ï¸ I can't delete messages
CANT_PIN: âš ï¸ I can't pin messages
CANT_PROMOTE: âš ï¸ I can't promote admins
CANT_INVITE: âš ï¸ I can't invite members
NAME: Name
CONFIRM_FORGOT:
Are you sure to forgot {user} data?
Any data of your group about this user will be deleted from my database, this action is irreversible
SUCCESSFULL_FORGOT:
User forgot successfully!

Please note: if user is still in group new data about him user will be stored again, note also that i removed data of this user only of this group, data about this user on other groups is not affected
ADV_REPORT_ISSUE: If you think it is an error please report it to https://github.com/Sp3rick/GroupHelp/issues
